titles.title: Shut In With Christ (nice word fit not always

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shut in Shut in from the ceaseless din of the restless world and its want and sin Shut in from its turmoil Care and strife And all the wearisome round of life{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shut in with tears That are spent in vain With dull compaionship Of pain Shut in with the changeless Days and hours And the bitter knowledge Of failing powers{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shut in with a trio of angels sweet Patience and Grace All pain to meet With faith that can suffer And stand and wait And lean on the promises Strong and great{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shut in with Christ Oh wonderful the thought Shut in with peace His sufferings brought Shut in with the love That wields the rod Oh company blest Shut in with God{/lang-eng}
